item.title: 20220823171728-quicknotes
item.description: OR: ive read somewhere and might want to read again “Because when you give too many fucks—when you give a fuck about everyone and everything—you will feel that you’re perpetually entitled to be comfortable and happy at all times, that everything is supposed to be just exactly the fucking way you want it to be.

item.title: 20220823172201-quicknotes
item.description: OR: ive read somewhere and might want to read again We have calcium in our bones, iron in our veins, carbon in our souls, and nitrogen in our brains.

item.title: All your perfects
item.description: OR: ive read somewhere and might want to read again $~$ “I promise to love you more when you’re hurting than when you’re happy.

item.title: Because it’ll never feel this way again
item.description: OR: ive read somewhere and might want to read again $~$ Go outside, take a breath Spin around, and let out a laugh

item.title: Homophobia
item.description: OR: ive read somewhere and might want to read again $~$ A: Will, can you teach me about homophobia? W: Sure, you know I don’t like carrots?

item.title: I can't think straight
item.description: OR: ive read somewhere and might want to read again Every night I empty my heart, but by morning it’s full again

item.title: ive read somewhere and might want to read again
Less Beautiful
item.description: OR: ive read somewhere and might want to read again “Can I see my baby?” the happy new mother asked.

item.title: rai
item.description: OR: ive read somewhere and might want to read again I hate things touching my neck. It makes me so uncomfortable.
